name: Wonder Farm
description:
Who dreams of going to play on the farm? Now you can every day with Wonder Farm!! Take a trip to the farm with the cutest animals. Not only that, playing with the animals down at Wonder Farm you get to learn how to count, colour and match shapes too. You can even learn a song and make up your own songs with our friendly chickens!

Pick any animal in Wonder Farm and play for as long as you want there’s no restrictions!

Features:

- Three super cute and friendly animals to play with

- Our chickens help you learn a song or make up your own songs

- Colour in our cow scene with 9 bright colours to choose from

- Feed our piggy and see how he reacted to different food

- Make sure all the sheep are put back into their field

- No third party advertising

- No in-app purchases


Parents can rest easy as there are no adverts, things can be pressed on that takes you away from the app and there are no in app purchases, whatsoever.

Have fun on the farm any time you want to, with the reassurance and peace of mind you need.
